NL description: The rover shall not run out of battery
Charging station location shall be static
FRETish: Navigation shall always satisfy chargePosition = x

NL description: Charging station shall be selected as the next destination whenever the recharge flag is set to true
Battery monitor shall show battery charge 5% lower than currently estimated
FRETish: Battery_Monitor shall always satisfy battery = pre_battery - 1/n - 0.05

NL description: The interface recharge output shall be set to true when the current battery charge is lower than battery needed to reach the charging station from the current position plus 5% battery charge.
FRETish: Interface shall always satisfy ((0.95*battery) <= chargeNeeded_var) => recharge

NL description: Once at charging station, rover shall remain there until battery reaches full charge.
FRETish: Interface shall always satisfy (goal = chargePosition & atGoal) => batteryFull

NL description: Each step in the plan shall not use more than 1/n amount of battery
FRETish: Interface shall always satisfy (battery = pre_battery - 1/n * length_plan)

NL description: The rover shall not collide with an obstacle
Initial rover position shall be static
FRETish: Navigation shall always satisfy initialPosition = y

NL description: Current rover position shall be accurate
FRETish: Navigation shall always satisfy currentPosition = currentPhysicalPosition

NL description: The vision subsystem shall ensure that the initial current rover position as recognised by the Vision is equal to the static initial position
FRETish: Map_Validator shall immediately satisfy start = s0

NL description: The Vision subsystem shall ensure that the current position is not a position with an obstacle
FRETish: Vision shall always satisfy ! currentPosition != obstacle

NL description: Rover shall not go faster than 10kmph
FRETish: Rover shall always satisfy speed <= 10 km

NL description: Visited heatpoint shall be removed from the list of destinations to visit
FRETish: If atGoal GRA shall after 1 tick satisfy removeGoalFromSet
LTL: ((H ((O[0,1] (atGoal & (Z (! atGoal)))) -> ((H (! atGoal)) | (! removeGoalFromSet)))) & (H ((O[2,2] ((atGoal & (Z (! atGoal))) & (! removeGoalFromSet))) -> (O[0,1] ((! (Y TRUE)) | removeGoalFromSet)))))

NL description: The interface subsystem shall set atGoal flag to true only when the current rover position is equal to the current goal position
FRETish: Interface shall always satisfy atGoal => currentPosition = goal
